name: Antimatter (Calastrovsk)
description:
This game was made for the GDevelop Gamejam #1

  • PRESS F11 to play in real FULL SCREEN

There is a guide during the game play teaching the user how to play. But here tips:

  • PRESS [R] to restart the last checkpoint
  • You can always start a new game from main menu if you run out of resource or get stuck in some level. 
  • Preserve your resources to beat hard levels.

Please feel free to leave a message, suggestion or any feedback.

Credits and Thanks to

  • Free Particle Library for Gdevelop by Wishforge https://wishforge.itch.io/free-gdevelop-particles-library
  • Ambient Song: horror-atmosphere-background http://chosic.com
  • SRA Free Pixel Font Pack by Lana Ro https://lana-ro.itch.io/sra-free-pixel-font-pack
  • SFX: jfxr https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/
  • VFX: Free PSD Brushes - Brusheezzy https://www.brusheezy.com/
  • Gdevelop team and evanglists https://gdevelop.io/
  • Discord members for general questions  https://discord.gg/rjdYHvj
